elements.name: Search shorts and shirts and add to cart

steps.name: the user navigates to the Zara website
the user logs in with valid credentials

steps.name: clicks on the menu and selects "Men" -> "See All"
the user searches for the word read from Excel cell row 0 col 0
searches for the second word from Excel cell (row: 0, col: 1)
selects a random product from the results
the product's information and price are saved to a text file
the product is added to the cart
the price on the product page should match the price in the cart
the product quantity is increased to 2
the quantity in the cart should be 2
the product is removed from the cart

name: Zara Product Search and Cart Management
